Spokane_Valley.Spokane Valley High School:
Spokane Valley High School (SVHS or SVH) in Spokane, Washington (state), USA, is part of the West Valley School District.


== History ==
The school has been featured on PBS once in 2010  and in 2013 on the Frontline episode "Education Under Arrest" hosted by Tavis Smiley. Spokane Valley High School opened its doors in 1982.
